creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
The LDAP provider is already included on JDK 1.3 and later systems, so it should
be omitted from the constructed class loaders (the same way that jndi.jar is
conditionally omitted).

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I would vote to remove ldap.jar instead of putting in an additional hack. That 
would clear out some licensing issues too. It should be pointed out that very 
few people will actually need this JAR (you would have to use 1.2 + the 
JNDIRealm).
